source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_00<tab>Ser Loanne would have you cull birds for the sake of all that is holy.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_00<tab>大審門の神殿騎士ロアヌは、害鳥の駆除をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_01<tab>Ser Loanne of Ishgard bids you cull some flying menace in the area. Though bemused by her high-handed vehemence, you are prepared to do as she asks and slay five bateleurs.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_01<tab>大審門近辺に棲む魔物の駆除を依頼された。「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2049F01 /var>」を5匹討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_02<tab>You slay five bateleurs, growing more dubious with each one, but a job is a job. Return to Ser Loanne and see whether she can tell you what use they are dead.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2049F01 /var>を討伐した。大審門の神殿騎士「ロアヌ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_03<tab>Pleased with your commission of this menial task, Ser Loanne reveals that the bateleurs share the knights' fondness for cloud cutters and other fish of the Sea of Clouds. In Ishgard, it is never a good idea to want what the knights want...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_SEQ_03<tab>ロアヌに報告した。<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2049F01 /var>は、神殿騎士の食料でもある、雲海に生息する浮行魚を食べてしまうらしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_000<tab>Adventurer, idleness ill becomes a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> so hale. Go slay for us five bateleurs that nest in these parts.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_000冒険者よ、お前に仕事をくれてやる。
この近辺に棲む「」を5匹駆除してくるのだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_001<tab>The crusade consumes the knights of Ishgard, body and soul. To you shall go such moils as we cannot stoop to, but at which you have enjoyed some success, if the tales be true. Your presence is a part of Halone's plan for us, the Fury be praised!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_001我ら騎士はドラゴン族との聖戦の渦中にあり、
卑しき雑事にかまけることなど許されていない。
ゆえに、特別にお前に任せる。ぬかるでないぞ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_020<tab>You have served well, adventurer. The bateleurs eat heartily of the bounty of the Sea of Clouds, and this we cannot allow.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_020ご苦労だったな。
お前に討伐を命じた「」は食欲旺盛でな、
雲海に生息する浮行魚を食い荒らしてしまうのだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_021<tab>The fish of that sublime sea belong to the noble knights of the crusade, not to lowly birds and beasts. The Fury has given us dominion over all creatures of this land, and the Dravanians too will understand this truth.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB907_00930_LOANNE_000_021雲海産の魚は、ドラゴン族との聖戦に臨む、
我ら誇り高き騎士の血肉にこそなるべきもの。
魔物に食われるなど、ありうべからざることなのだ。
